text: Baye basangisaki (Allah) bakoloba: Soki Allah alingaki kasi tosangisaki Allah te mpe biso na batata na biso, tokokaki kopekisa eloko te. Ndenge wana nde baye balekaki liboso na bango baboyaki kino bazuaki etumbu na biso. Loba: Boye bozali na boyebi epai na bino bobimisela yango, biso? Bozali kolanda sé makanisi mpe bozali kosala sé lokuta
